sentences.sContent: Smith said the crimson anthocyanin protects the delicate mechanisms that allow the tree to extract all the nutrients from its leaves.
sentences.sContent_eng: Smith said the crimson anthocyanin protects the delicate mechanisms that allow the tree to extract all the nutrients from its leaves.
sentences.sCn: 史密斯说，深红色的花青素保护着微妙的机制，它让树木从叶子里提取所需要的全部营养物。

sentences.sContent: So for your next holiday party, go for a LRD (Little Red Dress), and suggest he wear a crimson tie to match.
sentences.sContent_eng: So for your next holiday party, go for a LRD (Little Red Dress), and suggest he wear a crimson tie to match.
sentences.sCn: 所以说，下一个节日派对，穿着小红裙去吧，还要建议你的那个他也打上一条深红色领带。

sentences.sContent: Slashes of crimson peep from the lining of his ochre coat, suggesting, perhaps, that there is life in the old fellow yet.
sentences.sContent_eng: Slashes of crimson peep from the lining of his ochre coat, suggesting, perhaps, that there is life in the old fellow yet.
sentences.sCn: 赭色外套的衬里上，深红条纹隐约可见，这也许暗示着在这位老者身上依旧有着年轻的活力。

trans.tranOther: if your face crimsons, it becomes red because you are embarrassed
